about.whoIsTitle: Who is Op. Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz?
about.subtitle: Dedicated to Excellence in Orthopedic Care
about.paragraph1: Born and raised in İzmir, Turkey, Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz began his medical education at Ege University Faculty of Medicine in 1987 and graduated with honors in 1993. Motivated by a passion for musculoskeletal health, he pursued residency in orthopedic and traumatology surgery at İzmir Tepecik Training and Research Hospital from 1996 to 2000.
about.paragraph2: Since 2000, he has practiced as an orthopedic and traumatology specialist, performing thousands of surgeries including minimally invasive arthroscopic repairs and complex joint replacements. His meticulous approach and dedication to patient outcomes have earned him a reputation for excellence.
about.paragraph3: He served many years at Afyon Kocatepe State Hospital before joining Medera Hospital in Baku, where he expanded his expertise with international cases. Now back in Turkey, he continues his practice at Afyon Kocatepe State Hospital, offering personalized care informed by global experience.

about.title: About Dr. Gürkan Eryanılmaz
about.subtitle: Dedicated to Excellence in Orthopedic Care
about.missionText: I am committed to helping my patients achieve better mobility and quality of life by using the latest surgical techniques and medical technologies. My goal is to provide ethical, accessible, and reliable orthopedic care that truly makes a difference in people's lives.

arthroscopic.title: Arthroscopic Surgery
arthroscopic.description: Minimally invasive joint surgery using advanced arthroscopic techniques for faster recovery and better outcomes.
arthroscopic.detailDescription: Advanced minimally invasive surgical techniques using arthroscopy to diagnose and treat joint problems with smaller incisions, reduced pain, and faster recovery times.

procedures.kneeArthroscopyDesc: Minimally invasive knee surgery for meniscus tears, ligament injuries, and cartilage problems
procedures.shoulderArthroscopyDesc: Advanced shoulder surgery for rotator cuff tears, impingement, and instability
procedures.elbowArthroscopyDesc: Precise elbow surgery for tennis elbow, loose bodies, and joint stiffness
procedures.meniscusRepairDesc: Surgical repair of torn meniscus to restore knee function and prevent arthritis
procedures.aclReconstructionDesc: Complete reconstruction of torn anterior cruciate ligament for sports return
procedures.rotatorCuffRepairDesc: Arthroscopic repair of rotator cuff tears to restore shoulder strength and mobility
procedures.bankartRepairDesc: Surgical repair of shoulder instability and recurrent dislocations
procedures.subacromialDecompressionDesc: Treatment for shoulder impingement syndrome and pain relief
procedures.advancedShoulderDesc: Complex shoulder procedures including SLAP repairs and capsular releases

jointReplacement.title: Joint Replacement Surgery
jointReplacement.description: Complete joint replacement procedures for hip, knee, and shoulder using the latest prosthetic technologies.
jointReplacement.detailDescription: State-of-the-art joint replacement surgery using the most advanced prosthetic technologies to restore mobility and eliminate pain in severely damaged joints.

procedures.totalKneeDesc: Complete knee joint replacement for severe arthritis and joint damage
procedures.hipReplacementDesc: Total hip replacement surgery for arthritis, fractures, and joint deterioration
procedures.shoulderReplacementDesc: Complete shoulder joint replacement for severe arthritis and rotator cuff arthropathy
procedures.femoralHeadDesc: Partial hip replacement focusing on the femoral head component
procedures.shoulderArthroplastyDesc: Advanced shoulder replacement techniques including reverse total shoulder arthroplasty

trauma.title: Trauma & Fracture Surgery
trauma.description: Emergency orthopedic care and complex fracture repair with state-of-the-art surgical techniques.
trauma.detailDescription: Comprehensive trauma care and fracture surgery using advanced fixation techniques to restore bone integrity and joint function after injuries.

procedures.ankleFracturesDesc: Surgical repair of complex ankle fractures and malleolar injuries
procedures.hipFracturesDesc: Emergency treatment of hip fractures including femoral neck and intertrochanteric fractures
procedures.elbowFracturesDesc: Complex elbow fracture repair including olecranon and radial head fractures
procedures.jointDislocationsDesc: Treatment of joint dislocations and associated ligament injuries
procedures.footAnkleSurgeriesDesc: Comprehensive foot and ankle trauma surgery and reconstruction
procedures.cartilageInjuriesDesc: Treatment of cartilage damage and complex femur fractures

pediatric.title: Pediatric Orthopedics
pediatric.description: Specialized care for children's orthopedic conditions including hip dysplasia and developmental disorders.
pediatric.detailDescription: Specialized orthopedic care for children, focusing on growth-related conditions, congenital deformities, and pediatric trauma with age-appropriate treatment approaches.

procedures.congenitalDeformityDesc: Surgical correction of birth defects affecting bones and joints
procedures.hipDislocationDesc: Treatment of developmental dysplasia of the hip (DDH) in children
procedures.clubfootCorrectionDesc: Comprehensive treatment of clubfoot deformity in infants and children
procedures.shoulderDislocationDesc: Treatment of shoulder instability and dislocations in young patients
procedures.jointSurgeriesDesc: Age-appropriate joint surgeries preserving growth plates and future development

sports.title: Sports Injuries & Rehabilitation
sports.description: Comprehensive treatment for athletic injuries with focus on safe return to sport activities.
sports.detailDescription: Specialized treatment of sports-related injuries with emphasis on rapid recovery, performance restoration, and injury prevention for athletes of all levels.

procedures.muscleLigamentInjuriesDesc: Comprehensive treatment of acute and chronic sports injuries
procedures.athleteRehabilitationDesc: Sport-specific rehabilitation programs for safe return to competition
procedures.overuseInjuriesDesc: Treatment of repetitive stress injuries and chronic tendon problems
procedures.achillesTendonDesc: Surgical and non-surgical treatment of Achilles tendon injuries and ruptures

jointNerve.title: Joint & Nerve Conditions
jointNerve.description: Advanced procedures for joint problems and nerve compression syndromes.
jointNerve.detailDescription: Specialized treatment of joint disorders, nerve compression syndromes, and chronic pain conditions using both surgical and non-surgical approaches.

procedures.carpalTunnelDesc: Surgical release of median nerve compression in the wrist
procedures.nerveDecompressionDesc: Treatment of various nerve compression syndromes throughout the body
procedures.jointDisordersDesc: Correction of joint deformities and alignment problems
procedures.intraArticularInjectionsDesc: Therapeutic injections for joint pain and inflammation management
